data.title: Giannina Maradona’s biography: who is Diego Maradona’s daughter?
data.meta_description: GIANNINA MARADONA is known for being the daughter of the legendary footballer Diego Maradona and the ex-wife of Sergio Aguero. Check out her bio to know more.
data.text:
Giannina Maradona is an Argentine accessory designer and entrepreneur well known for being the youngest daughter of the legendary footballer Diego Maradona. She got more media attention when she married former Manchester City footballer Sergio Aguero and later divorced.

Giannina was born and raised in the limelight due to her father’s worldwide popularity. Check out her bio.

Profile summary

Full name: Giannina Maradona

Nickname: Giannina

Gender: Female

Date of birth: May 16, 1989

Age: 32 years old (as of 2021)

Zodiac sign: Taurus

Place of birth: Buenos Aires, Argentina

Current residence: Buenos Aires, Argentina

Nationality: Argentine

Religion: Christianity

Sexuality: Straight

Giannina Maradona’s height in feet: 5’6”

Height in centimetres: 170

Weight in pounds: 130

Weight in kilograms: 59

Body measurements in inches: 32-26-32

Body measurements in centimetres: 81-66-81

Hair colour: Caramel

Eye colour: Black

Mother: Claudia Villafane

Father: Diego Maradona

Siblings: 3

Relationship status: Divorced

Ex-partner: Sergio Aguero

Children: 1

Profession: Accessory designer

Instagram: @giamaradona

Giannina Maradona’s bio

She was born in Buenos Aires, Argentina, on May 16, 1989, to her parents Diego Maradona and Claudia Villafane. Giannina grew up alongside her elder sister called Dalma Nerea. In addition, she has step-brothers called Diego Fernando Maradona Ojeda and Diego Maradona Jr.

Her father was a legendary Argentine footballer and manager. He passed on November 25, 2020, in Dique Lujan, Argentina. Giannina’s mother, Claudia Rosana Villafane, is a renowned Argentine entrepreneur and producer. Giannina’s parents divorced in 2003.

How old is Giannina Maradona?

Diego Maradona’s daughter is 32 years old as of October 2021. She marks her birthday on May 16, and her birth sign is Taurus.

What does Giannina Maradona do for a living?

She works as an accessory designer at an online store called Delapaz. She is also an entrepreneur and sells a wide range of jewellery in an online store. Moreover, Giannina is a social media personality with a massive following on Instagram.

What is Giannina Maradona’s net worth?

According to Idol Net Worth, the youngest daughter of Diego Maradona has a net worth of $50 million.

Is Aguero still married to Giannina Maradona?

No, they are not married. Giannina got married to Argentine professional footballer Sergio Aguero in 2008, and they were blessed with a son called Benjamin Aguero on February 19, 2009. However, after four years of marriage, the couple called it quits and divorced in 2012.

Giannina Maradona’s son is 12 years old, and he is already a popular personality. Benjamin’s Instagram account has 184 thousand followers.

Who is Giannina Maradona’s husband?

She is not married and thus, does not have a husband. Giannina is single as she has not been in any relationship after the divorce with Aguero.

Controversy with her father

In 2015, Giannina Maradona’s father sued his ex-wife for stealing his $9 million between 2000 and 2015. The accusation led to a legal battle between Diego and Villafane in which Giannina and her sister stood in solidarity with their mother.

In 2017, after Giannina testified during the fraud case proceedings in Uruguay, Diego accused her of being an accomplice in the alleged fraud. Furthermore, Diego called for Giannina’s immediate arrest.

How tall is Giannina Maradona?

She stands at five feet and six inches tall. She weighs 130 pounds and has a slim body type. Additionally, her body measurements are 32-26-32 inches or 81-66-81 centimetres.

Social media presence

She is also a social celebrity with more than one million followers on Instagram. The accessory designer regularly posts pictures about her personal life and various designs of accessories she sells.

Giannina Maradona loves her son Benjamin, and she is on good terms with her ex-husband Sergio Aguero as they raise their son. Despite being raised in the limelight, she leads a quiet life without attracting a lot of publicity.

Legit.ng recently published an article about Jolie Poirier’s biography. She is a social media influencer, businesswoman and philanthropist. She is popularly known for being the wife of the famous mixed martial artist Dustin Poirier.

Her maiden name is Jolie LeBlanc, and she hails from Lafayette, Louisiana, US. She is a leading promoter of her husband’s major events. Moreover, she co-owns The Good Fight Foundation with Dustin.

She is a generous woman and she is known to donate significant amount of money to support causes such as health care and environmental disasters. Want to know more about her? Read more on her biography.

Source: Legit.ng
